Along with our Chicago staffing office’s contract and contract-to-hire services, they are also the headquarters of MondoX. Established in 2017, MondoX is the perm solution to all of your full-time, MarTech hiring needs. With an exclusive network of in-demand, niche MarTech talent — from Digital Marketing Managers to Marketing Technologists and MarTech Consultants — MondoX provides the long-term talent you need to elevate your MarTech strategy and make sure all those tech-based tools actually help grow your business.
